thread.title: Darwinte Parinamam introduces Shanker Sharma
thread.title_full: Darwinte Parinamam introduces Shanker Sharma - The Times of India

author: Anjana George
title: Darwinte Parinamam introduces Shanker Sharma
text:
Prithviraj starrer 'Darwinte Parinama' directed by Jijo Anthony will have a new music composer- Shanker Sharma.
The film that features Prithviraj as a satellite Television operator will have four songs. "Each songs of the film belongs to different genre and is written by Rafeeq Ahamed," says the director.
Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
